name: trie-memoize
description: A memoizer in which each argument represents a new key, creating a trie of caches
author: Jared Lunde <jared@BeStellar.co> (https://BeStellar.co)

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: rm -rf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es && npm run prettier:es
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs && npm run prettier:cjs
